query: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,直径AD与BC相交于点E,连接CD,若⊙O的半径为5,AB=AC=8,则EC长为()选项：['4', '\\frac{24}{5}', '\\frac{2}{3}', '\\frac{3}{4}']
answer:
解:∵AD是⊙O的直径,∴∠ACD=90°,∴CD=√{AD^{2}-AC^{2}}=6,∵AB=AC,∴∠ACE=∠B,∵∠B与∠D所对弧长相等,∴∠B=∠D,∴∠ACE=∠D,
又∵∠CAE=∠CAD,∴△AEC∽△ACD,∴\frac{AC}{AD}=\frac{EC}{CD},即\frac{8}{10}=\frac{EC}{6},
解得,EC=\frac{24}{5},
故选:B．
